channel.title: [614] Auto Vote/Donate commands
channel.description:
Hello, What i'm basically needing help with today is a command to retrieve your vote reward by a command, same with the donation.
I've set everything else up with Mysql and such, i'm just not exactly sure how to implement a command for it to check your vote/donation, and then give you the proper reward for the vote/donation. I'd greatly appreciate any help with this, and whichever code you may need, feel free to ask and i will post.
